string.value: |I crossed the Desert of Death! And even here I can feel the human presence. I am on the right track!
|First of all, I gotta repair and reload my truck. There must be a settlement nearby.
|Here’s the Oil storage. Now I have to load the truck with oil and get back. There should be no problems with that.
Congratulations! You have won the race!
Congratulations! You won the second prize.
Congratulations! You won the third prize.
You have lost!
You ruined the car and cannot continue the race.
False start! You have lost!
|I always dreamt about a trailer! Dreams come true!
|My old good truck, I started to worry about you. To hell with the trailer! I like my vehicle the way it is.
OLD MAN|Now we are safe, thanks to you!
|It was a pleasure helping you out. Good luck with traveling overseas!
|And take Alice with you. She seems to be thrown out of balance.

OLD MAN|One more thing. Now that I know you better, I can tell you about the man you seek. Ivan Go visited our village years ago. He asked many questions and left to the east. The deadliest part of the desert lies that way. Please, come with us. Do not follow him, only death awaits you there...
|God damn you! Something scared him to death... Poor fellow got completely crazy in the end. |What am I supposed to tell in Kef now?
|What am I supposed to tell in Kef now?
ALICE|I don’t feel good... Something is happening to me since our arrival to this desert.
|Stay cool! We are close to the goal now!
ALICE|It’s all your fault! You dragged me here and now you are going to let me die!
|[She cracked, after all. That's all I need!] Alice, calm down. Everything is all right. Look at me. I never meant you any harm.
ALICE|Sorry... I see... I’ll try to keep myself in hand... It’s all that frigging desert!
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.
Looks like the device that summons the boat isn't working. Or some barbarians have broken the local machinery. Anyway, I will have to drive.
You failed to protect the villagers. Now you’ll never reach your goal.
The trailer is destroyed. People won’t cooperate with you no more.
